name: Unauthorized Access Response Playbook
description: Step-by-step response to detect, contain, and eliminate unauthorized system access.
steps: Verify SIEM alert indicating unauthorized login or privilege escalation.
Check source IP, geolocation, and timestamp to confirm legitimacy.
Determine if the affected account is compromised or misused.
Immediately disable the compromised account and force password reset.
Revoke any elevated privileges granted during the incident.
Isolate the affected system from the network if malicious activity is detected.
Capture volatile data â€” running processes, open connections, memory snapshot.
Review logs for lateral movement or additional compromised accounts.
Scan impacted systems for malware, persistence mechanisms, or backdoors.
Remove malicious software, terminate unauthorized sessions, and close open ports.
Patch vulnerabilities that allowed unauthorized access (weak passwords, missing updates, exposed services).
Restore system integrity and validate normal operation.
Notify relevant stakeholders and document the full attack path.
Implement stronger authentication controls, firewall rules, and monitoring.
Perform a lessons-learned review and update policies accordingly.
